name: Fire Godess
uniques: [+2 Faith] from every [Geothermal Fissure]
[+2 Faith] from every [Volcanic Soil]
[+2 Faith] from every [Volcano]

name: City Patron Deity
uniques: [+25]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in this city] <before the [Classical era]>

name: City Patron Saint
uniques: [+25]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in this city] <after the [Classical era]>

name: Asceticism
uniques: [+2 Happiness] from every [Shrine] <in cities with at least [3] [Followers of this Religion]>

name: Jihad
uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing [All] units [in cities following this religion]

name: God of the Forge
uniques: [+25]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in this city] <before the [Medieval era]>

name: One Supreme God

[+2]% [Gold] from every follower, up to [20]%
Only available <after adopting [Mysticism]>

name: Panentheism
uniques: [+2]% [Culture] from every follower, up to [30]%
[+2 Gold, +2 Faith] from each Trade Route
Only available <after adopting [Mysticism]>

name: Papal Primacy
uniques: [+15]% growth [in this city] <when not at war>
[+3 Gold] per [4] population [in all cities]
[+3 Culture, +2 Faith, +1 Happiness] [in all cities] <when at war>

name: Iconoclasm
uniques: [+5 Faith, -2 Culture] from all [Faith] buildings <in cities with at least [3] [Followers of this Religion]>
[-1 Happiness, -2 Faith] from every [Dyes]

name: Holy Order
uniques: [Faith] cost of purchasing [Missionary] units [-30]%
[Faith] cost of purchasing [Inquisitor] units [-30]%

uniques: May buy [Dar-e Mehr] buildings for [255] [Faith] [in cities following this religion]
